Text: Thanks for a great classic!!! ...and that you kept the Swedish subtitle!!!! :-)

This is a great movie! :-) But is there anybody who is still seeding? We're a couple of people stuck at 49%. Any hope? 

Thanks in advance!
Another month, 9 people in my part of the torrent world with 72,1%... Progress! Perhaps finished downloading around Christmas? :-) Christmas at which Year, you say? ;-)

PAL to NTSC or NTSC to PAL freeware
http://www.videohelp.com/tools/IfoEdit 
Easy Tutorial: http://forum.videohelp.com/topic221928.html

After you change the region, backup the main movie in DVDShrinks Re-author tool to an ISO file or burn it. Make sure you use an RW DVD disc first to see if it will play on your DVD player.
